column1: The Purple Pig////Amazing restaurant right in Michigan Ave
column2: perfect girls night or date night spot. My 2 besties and I were able to share all of the dishes we ordered. We asked our waitress for suggestions and her picks were delicious
column4: the beets and wow the pork belly was amazing! Great drinks
column6: pricey but we split it 3 ways. I will definitely go again
column7: the next time I'm in the city!
